name: Trash Taste Simulator
description:
This game uses Open AI's API using the GPT-3 language model davinci-003, it's usage is paid per usage and i can't pay for everyone so when you open the game you have to use your own API key and account to acess OpenAI's services.

Fortunately, every new OpenAI account recives 18$ in credits which will grant you around 1 week of gameplay if you play moderately.

Basically what you have to do to get this game to work is go into https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys and paste some API key in the game in the settings.

You need an organization ID too that you can find here https://platform.openai.com/account/org-settings .

If you go to https://platform.openai.com/account/usage you can see your usage and how many credits are left, if you ran out of credits you can just create a new account and get the new API KEY and Organization ID.

In the settings you can change the Text Prompt to what ever you would like, i already put a default one and you can change this setting.

When changing the guest please use the following format:

:

just like the one that is already in.

You can interact with the Trash Taste podcast members as if you were a guest and the game is presented in a Visual Novel way.

Its basically an infinite AI generated Visual novel that you can interact in.

If you want an Android port just tell me in the comments.

This project is just an experiment to see how AI can behave trying to simulate a conversation between 3 degenerate weebs (and a guest in your chojce).

Credits to u/Sonicpower451 for the background
